text: Moji Solar-Wilson (born in 1964) from Ekiti State, is a Nigerian chief executive of a real estate company and a LGBTQ activist. In 2017 she married Margaret-Mary Wilson, a Nigerian-American physician. Moji and Margaret are the first openly Nigerian lesbian couple to be legally married in a same sex marriage. == References == Category:1964 births Category:Chief executives Category:LGBT rights activists Category:Living people Category:Nigerian LGBT people
title: Moji Solar-Wilson
